target.name: elements
target.sql:
SELECT * FROM ( with obj as ( SELECT "BI_OPERATION".NAME OPERATION , "BI_OPERATION".OPERATIONID OPERATIONID , "BI_PLAN".PLANNAME , "BI_PLAN".PLANNINGSTAGEDESC , "BI_PLAN".PLANID , to_char("BI_PLAN".PLANNINGYEAR) , "BI_REGION".NAME subregion , "BI_BUREAU".NAME bureau , POPULATIONGROUPNAME PPG , "BI_PRJPOPULATIONGROUP".MSRPCODE PPG_CODE , "BI_PRJPOPULATIONGROUP".ORIGPOPGROUP_ID , POPGROUPTYPE , "BI_GOAL".RFGOALID , "BI_RFGOALS".NAME AS GOAL_NAME , "BI_RIGHTSGROUP".RFRIGHTSGROUPID , "BI_RFRIGHTSGROUP".NAME AS "RIGHTS_GROUP_NAME" , "BI_OBJECTIVE".OBJECTIVEID OBJID , "BI_OBJECTIVE".RFPROBLEMOBJECTIVEID , "BI_RFPROBLOBJ".OBJECTIVENAME , "BI_RFPROBLOBJ".PROBLEMNAME FROM "BI_OPERATION" INNER JOIN "BI_PLAN" ON "BI_OPERATION"."OPERATIONID"="BI_PLAN"."OPERATIONID" INNER JOIN "BI_REGION" ON "BI_REGION"."REGIONID"="BI_OPERATION"."REGIONID" INNER JOIN "BI_BUREAU" ON "BI_BUREAU"."BUREAUID"="BI_REGION"."BUREAUID" INNER JOIN "BI_PRJPOPULATIONGROUP" ON "BI_PLAN"."PLANID"="BI_PRJPOPULATIONGROUP"."PLANID" INNER JOIN "BI_GOAL" ON "BI_PRJPOPULATIONGROUP"."POPULATIONGROUP_ID"="BI_GOAL"."POPULATIONGROUPID" INNER JOIN "BI_RFGOALS" ON "BI_GOAL"."RFGOALID" = "BI_RFGOALS"."ID" INNER JOIN "BI_RIGHTSGROUP" ON "BI_GOAL"."GOALID"="BI_RIGHTSGROUP"."GOALID" INNER JOIN "BI_RFRIGHTSGROUP" ON "BI_RIGHTSGROUP"."RFRIGHTSGROUPID" = "BI_RFRIGHTSGROUP"."ID" INNER JOIN "BI_OBJECTIVE" ON "BI_RIGHTSGROUP"."RIGHTSGROUPID"="BI_OBJECTIVE"."RIGHTSGROUPID" INNER JOIN "BI_RFPROBLOBJ" ON "BI_OBJECTIVE"."RFPROBLEMOBJECTIVEID" = "BI_RFPROBLOBJ"."ID" WHERE PLANNINGYEAR >= 2012 AND PLANNINGSTAGE = 8 ) select 'OPERATION_NAME' , 'OPERATION_ID' , 'PLAN_NAME' , 'PLANNINGSTAGEDESC' , 'PLAN_ID' , 'PLANNINGYEAR' , 'SUBREGION' , 'BUREAU' , 'PPG_NAME' , 'PPG_CODE' , 'PPG_ID' , 'POPGROUPTYPE' , 'RFGOAL_ID' , 'GOAL_NAME' , 'RFRIGHTS_GROUP_ID' , 'RIGHTS_GROUP_NAME' , 'OBJID' , 'RFPROBLEM_OBJECTIVE_ID' , 'OBJECTIVE_NAME' , 'PROBLEM_NAME' , 'PERFINDICATOR_RFID' , 'PERFINDICATOR_NAME' , 'PERFINDICATOR_SHORT' , 'IMPACTINDICATOR_RFID' , 'IMPACTINDICATOR_NAME' , 'OUTPUTID' , 'RFOUTPUT_ID' , 'OUTPUT_NAME' , 1 as ordering from obj union select obj.* , "BI_PERFINDICATOR".ID AS "PERFINDICATOR_RFID" , "BI_PERFINDICATOR".NAME AS "PERFINDICATOR_NAME" , "BI_PERFINDICATOR".SHORTDESCRIPTION AS "PERFINDICATOR_SHORT" , NULL AS IMPACTINDICATOR_RFID , NULL AS IMPACTINDICATOR_NAME , "BI_OUTPUTGRP".OUTPUTID , "BI_OUTPUTGRP".RFOUTPUTID , "BI_RFOUTPUTS".NAME AS "OUTPUT_NAME" , 2 as ordering from obj LEFT OUTER JOIN "BI_OUTPUTGRP" ON "OBJID"="BI_OUTPUTGRP"."OBJECTIVEID" LEFT OUTER JOIN "BI_RFOUTPUTS" ON "BI_RFOUTPUTS".ID = "BI_OUTPUTGRP".RFOUTPUTID LEFT OUTER JOIN "BI_PERFINDICATOR" ON "BI_OUTPUTGRP"."RFOUTPUTID" = "BI_PERFINDICATOR"."RFOUTPUT_ID" union select obj.* , NULL AS "PERFINDICATOR_RFID" , NULL AS "PERFINDICATOR_NAME" , NULL AS "PERFINDICATOR_SHORT" , "BI_IMPACTINDICATOR".ID AS "IMPACTINDICATOR_RFID" , "BI_IMPACTINDICATOR".NAME AS "IMPACTINDICATOR_NAME" , NULL AS OUTPUTID , NULL AS RFOUTPUTID , NULL AS "OUTPUT_NAME" , 2 as ordering from obj LEFT OUTER JOIN "BI_IMPACTINDICATOR" ON "RFPROBLEMOBJECTIVEID" = "BI_IMPACTINDICATOR"."RFPROBOBJ_ID" order by ordering )
WHERE rownum <= 50
